sources.title: Remedy for Riches (1940)
sources.description: A small town doctor suspects the stranger in town is promoting an oil swindle. The fourth entry in the "Dr. Christian" series of six films. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/remedy-for-riches-1940/

sources.title: Remedy for Riches (1940) DR. CHRISTIAN
sources.description:
Stars: Jean Hersholt, Dorothy Lovett, Edgar Kennedy
 Director: Erle C. Kenton

 In this 4th entry of the "Dr. Christian" series, a pair of city slickers are intent on selling some oil-wells, but the good doctor suspects a swindle and sets out to prove it.

sources.title: Remedy for Riches (1940) Dr Christian | Comedy Full Length Movie
sources.description:
A college friend of the local soda-jerk comes to town and lets it be known that he's looking for property on which to build a resort. When he buys some land and suddenly "discovers" there's oil underneath it--and generously offers to sell the townspeople shares in his newly found... Read all

Director: Erle C. Kenton
Writer:  Lee Loeb
Stars: Jean Hersholt, Dorothy Lovett, Edgar Kennedy
Genres: Classics, Comedy

metadata.Plot: A college friend of the local soda-jerk comes to town and lets it be known that he's looking for property on which to build a resort. When he buys some land and suddenly "discovers" there's oil underneath it--and generously offers to sell the townspeople shares in his newly found oil reserves--Dr. Christian suspects a swindle and sets out to prove it.
metadata.Actors: Jean Hersholt, Dorothy Lovett, Edgar Kennedy
